com.paydiant.android.ui.service.offer

Class OfferRetrievalListenerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paydiant.android.ui.service.offer.OfferRetrievalListenerAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IOfferRetrievalListener

    public class OfferRetrievalListenerAdapter
extends Object
implements IOfferRetrievalListener
    This class provides an empty implementation for IOfferRetrievalListener. Any classes that wants to use only a subset of the listener methods can override the relevant methods and use it as the interface implementation. 

     OfferRetrievalListenerAdapter offerRetrievalListenerAdapter = new OfferRetrievalListenerAdapter() {
 
    @Override
    public void onAvailableOfferListRetrievalSuccess(OfferCampaignList offerCampaignList) {
    }
 
    @Override
    public void onOfferRetrievalError(PaydiantException e) {
    }
 };
 iOfferRetrievalService.setOfferRetrievalListener(offerRetrievalListenerAdapter);
    Note: App developers are encouraged to use the ListenerAdapter implementations whenever possible as the Listener interfaces might get updated with new functionality/methods from one SDK release to the other. Therefore using a ListenerAdapter will make sure that there wont be any compilation issues due to unimplemented methods during a SDK upgrade.

    Author:
    Paydiant
